I.i.1.A.4.g
.
Definition:  Event
Event
means one or more incidents associated with places, types, and circumstances of service giving rise to disability.
Reference
:  The definition of event for the purpose of this chapter is set forth in
38 CFR 3.159(a)(4)
.
title: M21-1, Part I, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Description and General Information on Duty to Notify and Duty to Assist
citation: Part I, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
